  • Field Details

    • replacements

      private final List<ReplacingPhrase> replacements

    • activate

      private final boolean activate

    • global

      private final boolean global
      If activate is true: whether or not replacements replace all previously defined replacements or not. E.g. false in case of a REPLACE ALSO, but true otherwise.

      If activate is false: whether or not we're deactivating all replacements ever defined, or just the most recently activated ones. E.g. true in case of a REPLACE LAST OFF, but false in case of a REPLACE OFF.

      For COPY statements this should always be false as replacement clauses in a COPY statement are additive.
